title: Firefin Splatterscope
paragraphs: The Firefin Splatterscope is a main weapon in Splatoon 2. It is a Firefin-branded variant of the Splatterscope and a scoped variant of the Firefin Splat Charger.
In Splatoon 3, following Firefin's merger with Zekko to form Z+F, this weapon is succeeded by the Z+F Splatterscope.

The Firefin Splatterscope is nearly identical in appearance to the Firefin Splat Charger. The only difference between the two is that the Firefin Splatterscope has a scope attached to the back end of the barrel.
The Firefin Splatterscope comes with the sub Splash Wall and the special Suction-Bomb Launcher.
For competitive tips about the Firefin Splatterscope
- The Firefin logo serves as the gun's front sights.
